custodian-of-records.description: All models depicted on this web site are 18 years of age or older. The publisher of this website merely distributes and does not hire, contract for, manage, or otherwise arrange for the participation of any performers depicted. The performer's identification documents and initial production dates for any depictions of actual sexually explicit conduct created on or after July 3, 1995 are contained in the records maintained by primary producer of the materials distributed as required by 18 U.S.C. 2257 and 28 C.F.R. 75. The republication date for depictions subject to 18 U.S.C 2257 is the date of entry info this web site which is 5/09/2007.

original-records.text: Original records required pursuant to 18 U.S.C. section 2257 and 28 C.F.R 75 for all materials contained in the website are kept by the following

statement.title: Statement of exemption under 28 C.F.R. 75.1
statement.text: Certain depictions of conduct set forth in 18 U.S.C. 2257(h)(1) were produced prior to July 3, 1995 or contain only visual depictions of simulated sexual activity and are therefore not covered by the record keeping requirements of 18 U.S.C 2257 and 28 C.F.R. 75.
